wcGeneSummary 0.99.0
  • Reference

    wcGeneSummary

    wcBSDB

    wcBSDB.Rd

    Visualize BugSigDB

    Usage

    wcBSDB(
  mbList,
  excludeFreq = 1000,
  excludeTfIdf = NA,
  additionalRemove = NA,
  tfidf = FALSE,
  target = "title",
  apiKey = NULL,
  pre = FALSE,
  pvclAlpha = 0.95,
  numOnly = TRUE,
  madeUpper = c("dna", "rna"),
  redo = NULL,
  pal = c("blue", "red"),
  numWords = 15,
  scaleRange = c(5, 10),
  showLegend = FALSE,
  edgeLabel = FALSE,
  mbPlot = FALSE,
  ngram = NA,
  plotType = "wc",
  disPlot = FALSE,
  onWholeDTM = FALSE,
  colorText = FALSE,
  corThresh = 0.2,
  tag = FALSE,
  tagWhole = FALSE,
  layout = "nicely",
  edgeLink = TRUE,
  deleteZeroDeg = TRUE,
  cl = FALSE,
  ...
)

    Arguments

    mbList

    microbe list

    excludeFreq

    exclude words with overall frequency above excludeFreq default to 0

    excludeTfIdf

    exclude based on tfidf (default: NA)

    additionalRemove

    specific words to be excluded

    tfidf

    use TfIdf when making TDM

    target

    "title" or "abstract"

    apiKey

    api key for eutilities

    pre

    predefined filter words

    pvclAlpha

    alpha for pvpick()

    numOnly

    delete number only

    madeUpper

    make the words uppercase in resulting plot

    redo

    if "abstract" is chosen in target, one can provide resulting object again

    pal

    palette for color gradient in correlation network and tag coloring

    numWords

    the number of words to be shown

    scaleRange

    scale for label and node size in correlation network

    showLegend

    whether to show legend in correlation network

    edgeLabel

    if TRUE, plot the edge label (default: FALSE)

    mbPlot

    plot microbe names

    ngram

    default to NA (1)

    plotType

    "wc" or "network"

    disPlot

    plot diseases

    onWholeDTM

    calculate correlation network on whole dataset or top-words specified by numWords

    colorText

    color text label based on frequency in correlation network

    corThresh

    the correlation threshold

    tag

    perform pvclust on words and colorlize them in wordcloud

    tagWhole

    tag whole set or subset

    layout

    the layout for correlation network, defaul to "nicely"

    edgeLink

    if FALSE, use geom_edge_diagonal

    deleteZeroDeg

    delete zero degree node from plot in correlation network

    cl

    cluster object passed to pvclust

    ...

    parameters to pass to wordcloud()

    Value

    list of data frame and ggplot2 object

    Examples

    mbList <- c("Veillonella dispar")
wcBSDB(mbList)
#> Input microbes: 1
#> Error in completeSubclasses(classDef2, class1, obj, where) : 
#>   trying to get slot "subclasses" from an object of a basic class ("NULL") with no slots
